name: bdopln

stmt.origin: simplbi(wcel(c0, cbo), wcel(c0, clo), wbr(cfv(cnop, c0), clt, cpnf))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cbo), wcel(c0, clo))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cbo), wa(wcel(c0, clo), wbr(cfv(cnop, c0), clt, cpnf)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ BndLinOp → c0 ∈ LinOp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ BndLinOp ↔(c0 ∈ LinOp ∧(normop ` c0)[<]+∞))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cbo), wcel(c0, clo))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cbo), wa(wcel(c0, clo), wbr(cfv(cnop, c0), clt, cpnf)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ BndLinOp → c0 ∈ LinOp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ BndLinOp ↔(c0 ∈ LinOp ∧(normop ` c0)[<]+∞))

body.origin: |- wb(wcel(c0, cbo), wa(wcel(c0, clo), wbr(cfv(cnop, c0), clt, cpnf)))

comment: A bounded linear Hilbert space operator is a linear operator. (Contributed by NM, 18-Feb-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
